overview: Teachers and students should never cross the line - but when they do, the results can be explosive. Watch professor Saige give her student Emma the spanking she deserves! Professor London gives her student Lily a helping hand in figuring out her sexuality! Can Professor Aaliyah end her affair with her student Paisley? Or will she be seduced one last time? Watch Professor Ryan unleash her pent-up passion on her student Charlotte Sins!
title: Student Teacher Relations
